name: Telehooks SMS Notifications
author: Onjection

sections.description:
Telehooks provides SMS Notification Services

Features

  1. Notify your customers about their orders via SMS.
  2. Customer notification on important Order create, Update and Customer profile Update.

Benefits

  1. Reduces Customer Queries and Improves User Experience
  2. Improves the post-buying experience for both customer and the merchant

** 7 days trial is free for sms and email notifications to customer. **
In case facing any issue while installation/any query contact us at contact@onjection.com or login to http://telehooks.com

After Installation

  1. Click on menu link Telehooks SMS.
  2. If you don’t have Telehooks account,register on http://telehooks.com/register, link (Register Here) is given in admin panel.
  3. After registration,Telehooks loginid and Password will be sent to your registered email.
  4. Enter Telehooks loginid, Password , Consumer Key , Secret Key in the form and click on Connect to Telehooks.

Localization

  • english

Features

  • Customer can get info about his order and sms notifications.
sections.installation:
1. Install Telehooks SMS Notification either via the WordPress.org plugin repository, or by uploading the files to your server
  2. After activating the plugin, Please follow instructions.
  3. Thats it!!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install Telehooks SMS Notification either via the WordPress.org plugin repository, or by uploading the files to your server
  2. After activating the plugin, Please follow instructions.
  3. Thats it!!

How to connect with telehooks?

Just register at the telehooks and put that Email Id and Password and you store Keys. After the you will connect to Telehooks.
